categories: Category:Imperial Navy admirals of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Vence Tabok was an Imperial admiral who was put in charge of Zirtran's Anchor after it had been occupied by the Empire. Tabok disappeared along with the space station when it vanished under mysterious circumstances, and was never heard from again. Rumors had it that he was really sent to the station to locate a missing creator of a miniature cloaking device.
